title: looking for a team for competetive i main adc jg and sup
body: I want to be part of a team that plays to win, im silver 4, and my mains are adc jg or sup. My gt is 6pathss add me if you need me :D

replies.body: Hi please have a look at http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/xWNEFfMK-tactical-gaming-tg-is-looking-for-you-with-coaching. if you are interested please drop an application and use me as a referral. TG Atlas. We are looking for someone around your elo for one of our teams!
Keep looking man, maybe ask in game or on forums such cybergamer
ive looked on cybergamer and they want real high players, i am working my way up but really want to play as part of a team
